MD001.name: heading-increment
MD001.description: Heading levels should only increment by one level at a time

MD004.name: ul-style
MD004.description: Unordered list style should be consistent

MD005.name: list-indent
MD005.description: Inconsistent indentation for list items at the same level

MD007.name: ul-indent
MD007.description: Unordered list indentation should be consistent

MD011.name: no-reversed-links
MD011.description: Reversed link syntax is not allowed

MD012.name: no-multiple-blanks
MD012.description: Multiple consecutive blank lines are not allowed

MD013.name: line-length
MD013.description: Line length should not exceed specified limit

MD018.name: no-missing-space-atx
MD018.description: No space after hash on ATX style heading

MD019.name: no-multiple-space-atx
MD019.description: Multiple spaces after hash on ATX style heading

MD020.name: no-missing-space-closed-atx
MD020.description: No space inside hashes on closed ATX style heading

MD021.name: no-multiple-space-closed-atx
MD021.description: Multiple spaces inside hashes on closed ATX style heading

MD022.name: blanks-around-headings
MD022.description: Headings should be surrounded by blank lines

MD023.name: heading-start-left
MD023.description: Headings must start at the beginning of the line

MD024.name: no-duplicate-heading
MD024.description: Multiple headings with the same content

MD025.name: single-title
MD025.description: Multiple top level headings in the same document

MD031.name: blanks-around-fences
MD031.description: Fenced code blocks should be surrounded by blank lines

MD032.name: blanks-around-lists
MD032.description: Lists should be surrounded by blank lines

MD036.name: no-emphasis-as-heading
MD036.description: Emphasis used instead of a heading

MD040.name: fenced-code-language
MD040.description: Fenced code blocks should have a language specified

MD041.name: first-line-heading
MD041.description: First line in file should be a top level heading

MD044.name: proper-names
MD044.description: Proper names should have the correct capitalization

MD045.name: no-alt-text
MD045.description: Images should have alternate text (alt text)

MD047.name: single-trailing-newline
MD047.description: Files should end with a single newline character

MD052.name: reference-links-images
MD052.description: Reference links and images should use a label that is defined

MD053.name: link-image-reference-definitions
MD053.description: Link and image reference definitions should be needed
